person.persName: Robert E. Pitt (Calloway County, KY, merchant, soldier, and prov gov)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Tabitha Pitt. Resident of Calloway County in 1850. Merchant in Calloway County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from August 1861 to October 1861. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861. Merchant in Calloway County in 1863.
